cleaned_text: We encounter so many ideas and claims on a daily basis, and it can be hard to know what to trust. How do you know what is based on sound evidence, and what has been shown to be incorrect? To help sort fact from fiction, we have produced some simple summaries of a number of the most common pseudosciences and bad ideas you might come across, [as well as a full factsheet on the many alternative cancer treatments we have seen advertised](https://goodthinkingsociety.org/projects/cancer-and-alternative-therapies/).
